snippet: Jadeveon Clowney, the No. 1 overall pick in the draft by the Houston Texans, is recovering from sports hernia surgery.
lead_paragraph: Jadeveon Clowney, the No. 1 overall pick in the draft by the Houston Texans, is recovering from sports hernia surgery.

headline.main: Texans’ Clowney Has Sports Hernia Surgery
headline.print_headline: Texans' Clowney has sports hernia surgery
